properties.areaDesc: Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Eddy County Plains; Gaines; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Central Lea County; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 9:35PM CST until January 31 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two
inches.

* WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, Southeast New Mexico
Plains, and Gaines county.

* WHEN...From 4 AM CST /3 AM MST/ to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by
calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM CST /3 AM MST/ TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ FRIDAY
